channel.title: Pipelines on WETHOD / Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Pipelines on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Pipeline
item.description: Overview The pipeline is the core of Wethod. Here is where you can find and manage all the opportunities and projects of your company. The different steps and phases of a project can be managed in different sections: Basket Pipeline Opportunities Projects Basket The Basket contains all the opportunities that are not well-defined yet. You can see it as a place where to put all the ideas that you usually write on a notebook or on a Post-It.
